body:
SELECT user_id, isbn, book_rating
  FROM books.book_ratings
  WHERE user_id=0 AND isbn=''
  LIMIT 500;

SELECT isbn, book_author, publisher, book_title, image_url_l, image_url_m,
  image_url_s, year_of_publication
  FROM books.books
  WHERE isbn='' AND book_author='' AND publisher=''
  LIMIT 500;

SELECT isbn, book_author, publisher, book_title, image_url_l, image_url_m,
  image_url_s, year_of_publication
  FROM books.books
  LIMIT 500;

SELECT  publisher, COUNT(*) as book_count 
GROUP BY publisher
FROM books.books 
LIMIT 100;

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT (book_title, year_of_publication)
FROM books.books
PRIMARY KEY((publishers, ISBN))

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT (book_title, year_of_publication)
FROM books.books
PRIMARY KEY((publishers, ISBN))

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publishers, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publishers, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publishers, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publishers, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publishers, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publisher, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publisher, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publisher, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publisher, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS publishers
AS SELECT book_title, year_of_publication, ISBN
FROM books
WHERE book_title IS NOT NULL AND ISBN IS NOT NULL
PRIMARY KEY((publisher, ISBN), year_of_publication)

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW books.publishers_view
  AS SELECT
  isbn, book_author, publisher, book_title, year_of_publication
  FROM books.books
  WHERE isbn IS NOT NULL AND book_author IS NOT NULL AND publisher IS NOT NULL
  PRIMARY KEY(publisher, book_author);

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW books.publishers_view
  AS SELECT
  isbn, book_author, publisher, book_title, year_of_publication
  FROM books.books
  WHERE isbn IS NOT NULL AND book_author IS NOT NULL AND publisher IS NOT NULL
  PRIMARY KEY(publisher, book_author,isbn);

SELECT publisher, COUNT(*) as book_counts
  FROM books.publishers_view
  GROUP BY publisher
  LIMIT 500;

SELECT publisher, COUNT(*) as book_counts
FROM books.publishers_view
WHERE publisher IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY publisher
LIMIT 500;

SELECT publisher, COUNT(*) as book_counts
FROM books.publishers_view
GROUP BY publisher
LIMIT 500;

SELECT publisher, COUNT(*) as book_counts
FROM books.publishers_view
WHERE publisher IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY publisher
LIMIT 500;

SELECT publisher, COUNT(*) as book_counts
FROM books.publishers_view
WHERE book_counts IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY publisher
LIMIT 500;

SELECT publisher, COUNT(*) as book_counts
FROM books.publishers_view
WHERE publisher IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY publisher;

SELECT publisher, COUNT(*) as book_counts
FROM books.publishers_view
GROUP BY publisher
ALLOW FILTERING;

-- change table name and structure
CREATE TABLE books.table_name(
	ISBN text,
	publisher text,
	year_of_publication int,
	PRIMARY KEY((publisher), year_of_publication, ISBN)
);
DROP TABLE books.table_name;

-- change table name and structure
CREATE TABLE books.publisher_books(
	ISBN text,
	publisher text,
	year_of_publication int,
	PRIMARY KEY((publisher), year_of_publication, ISBN)
);

SELECT publisher, COUNT (*) as publish_count
  FROM books.publisher_books
  GROUP BY publisher
  ORDER BY publish_count DESC
  LIMIT 500;

SELECT publisher, COUNT (*) AS publish_count
  FROM books.publisher_books
  GROUP BY publisher
  LIMIT 500;

  ## ORDER BY publish_count DESC

SELECT publisher, COUNT (*) AS publish_count
  FROM books.publisher_books
  GROUP BY publisher
  LIMIT 500;

  # ORDER BY publish_count DESC
  # works in cql and not workbench

CREATE TABLE books.author_books(
	ISBN text,
	book_author text,
    book_title text,
	year_of_publication int,
	PRIMARY KEY((book_author), year_of_publication, ISBN, book_title)
);

SELECT publisher, COUNT(*) as book_counts
FROM books.publishers_view
GROUP BY publisher
LIMIT 100;

-- ORDER BY book_counts - doesnt work
-- group by works only in Cqlsh
